msbt.message: The Bug-Off is finally here! I wonder if the bugs we're about to catch are as nervous as I am?
Today is the Bug-Off, and that means you and I will be rivals. We will be civilized about it, won't we, darling?
I understand the Bug-Off starts at 9:00 AM today. Surely you'll join? It wouldn't be the same without you.
The Bug-Off is a serious competition, my dear! We must put our best nets forward today!
It's so hot out hereand yet the bugs don't seem to mind. They're buzzing about like crazy! I suppose we'll just have to keep our cool and try to keep up!
Good grief! I just scared off a bug at the last second. Ah well, I suppose I shouldn't let itbug me! Haha!
Who knew that bug catching was so much fun?! I tell you, the next Bug-Off can't come soon enough!
That Bug-Off was simply wonderful! But after swinging that net around my arms are as limp as noodles! Hmmm. Yes. What I need now is some pampering. I think a massage will do nicely.

Well, the Bug-Off certainly was quite a lot of commotion today, wouldn't you say? Are you as exhausted as I am?I, for one, can't wait to get home and fall into bed. I'll sleep snug as a bug in a rug. Haha!

It gives me such a fright when bugs suddenly flitter out of the shadows! I get so flustered that I miss them! I know it's silly. I'm so big and they're so teensy What could they possibly do to me? Stillick!
You know, going after bugs that you find easy to catch can be a winning strategy. Even if you catch the same kind of bug, the amount counts. So catch as many as you like, my dear.

You know, I catch all kinds of bugs during my day-to-day life and don't give it a second thought. And yet, I get terribly tense during the Bug-Off! I suppose it's just my competitive streak kicking in.

I've been trying to decide what the best strategy is when it comes to winning the Bug-Off. And I've finally figured it out, my dear! The best strategy isdon't waste your time thinking about strategy, just swing your net at as many bugs as you can. Haha!

Ahhh, Bug-Off season has finally arrived! Isn't it wonderful?My plan this time? Why, I shall dance like a butterflyand catch like a bee!Or, you know, something like that. My point being, I shall pursue those bugs with grace and elegance. Remember, it's not just whether you win or loseâ€”it's how you look while playing the game, !

I must say, I feel quite certain I'm going to have no problem catching one bug after another. Not only am I VERY persistent, I may or may not have a secret weapon at my disposal! Don't tell anyone, but I'm almost certain the perfume I'm wearing umattracts bugs. It's not exactly what I was going for when I put it on, but I'll take any edge I can get, !
Are you joining the Bug-Off today? Even with all this heat?My goodness, how very energetic of you, .Well, I suppose if you can do it, so can I! Watch out bugs, here we come, !
Once Bug-Off season ends, it will truly be fall, I suppose. It's a tad bittersweet, don't you think? Well, at least I get to close out the last event of this season with you. I have no regrets, .
Having a hard time containing your excitement, my dear?Well, it IS the first Bug-Off of the year, so who could blame you?Just get yourself out there, and go BUG wild, !
Tell me, how are you faring in the Bug-Off, ?My pearls, darling, I am NOT doing very well. For some reason, I just keep scaring the bugs off! Wait a minute Is THAT why they call it a Bug-OFF, ?

Ugh, I see you're chipper as ever, even in the heat I don't know how you do it. Bug-Off or not, I simply can't run about willy-nilly in this temperature. I might faint, after all. Or worse yet, someone might see me sweating! We can't have that, now can we, ?
The last Bug-Off of the year is here. I confess, it makes me a bit blue.But no, no! I must keep my chin up! I shall finish this year's event with a bug-catching flourish, !
Having a hard time containing your excitement, my dear?Well, it IS the first Bug-Off of the season, so who could blame you?Just get yourself out there, and go BUG wild, !
Tell me, how are you faring in the Bug-Off, ?My pearls, darling, I am NOT doing very well. For some reason, I just keep scaring the bugs off! Wait a minute Is THAT why they call it a Bug-OFF, ?

Ugh, I see you're chipper as ever, even in the heat I don't know how you do it. Bug-Off or not, I simply can't run about willy-nilly in this temperature. I might faint, after all. Or worse yet, someone might see me sweating! We can't have that, now can we, ?
The last Bug-Off of the season is here. I confess, it makes me a bit blue. But no, no! I must keep my chin up! I shall finish this event with a bug-catching flourish, !
